channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16634] Speedup TestExportSnapshot
item.description:
TestExportSnapshot is a long and heavy test since has to take snapshot, export (via MR), restore them and so on. this in general make the test flaky due to slowness.

let's try to speed it up a bit by reducing the number of regions of the table we are testing on 9 regions at the moment we can reduce it at least to 2

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

lgtm Matteo Bertozzi Are the failures above related?

doesn't look like, a quick grep for snapshot in that code does not show anything. I also did two runs and they seems to pass

let me try v1, some tests in the run here failed with timeout/OOM
and I noticed that there is inconsistencies with the ExportSnapshot test subclasses. some uses Medium, some Large and so on.
I also turned down the default number of regions to from 9 to 6, let see if we improve something...
